meanings.definition: The state of being divided into parts or sections.
meanings.sent1: The dividednesses of the cake made it easy to share with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The dividednesses of opinions in the meeting led to a lengthy discussion.
meanings.sent3: The dividednesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: The dividednesses of the city into neighborhoods created a sense of community.
meanings.sent5: The dividednesses of the map helped travelers navigate through the different regions.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being divided or separated.
meanings.sent1: The dividednesses of the fence indicated a clear boundary.
meanings.sent2: The dividednesses of the relationship caused tension between the friends.
meanings.sent3: The dividednesses of the socks made it hard to find a matching pair.
meanings.sent4: The dividednesses of the road highlighted the need for a bridge.
meanings.sent5: The dividednesses of the bookshelves created distinct sections for different genres.

meanings.definition: The act or process of dividing or splitting into parts.
meanings.sent1: The dividednesses of the cell during mitosis is a fascinating biological process.
meanings.sent2: The dividednesses of the cake batter into individual cupcakes made baking easier.
meanings.sent3: The dividednesses of the class into groups for the project was efficient.
meanings.sent4: The dividednesses of the river into tributaries increased the biodiversity of the region.
meanings.sent5: The dividednesses of the pie into slices made it perfect for sharing at the party.
